mapper.sql: pltmOrder.id as pltmOrder_id, pltmOrder.order_number as pltmOrder_order_number, pltmOrder.pss_order_number as pltmOrder_pss_order_number, pltmOrder.pss_routing_fare_id as pltmOrder_pss_routing_fare_id, pltmOrder.purch_quantity as pltmOrder_purch_quantity, pltmOrder.travel_days as pltmOrder_travel_days, pltmOrder.unit_price as pltmOrder_unit_price, pltmOrder.luggage_info as pltmOrder_luggage_info, pltmOrder.ticket_limit_time as pltmOrder_ticket_limit_time, pltmOrder.pay_price as pltmOrder_pay_price, pltmOrder.pay_name as pltmOrder_pay_name, pltmOrder.pay_account as pltmOrder_pay_account, pltmOrder.pay_user_id as pltmOrder_pay_user_id, pltmOrder.pay_time as pltmOrder_pay_time, pltmOrder.order_status as pltmOrder_order_status, pltmOrder.create_user as pltmOrder_create_user, pltmOrder.create_time as pltmOrder_create_time, pltmOrder.last_modify_time as pltmOrder_last_modify_time, pltmOrder.last_modify_person as pltmOrder_last_modify_person, pltmOrder.remark as pltmOrder_remark, pltmOrder.to_start_airport as pltmOrder_to_start_airport, pltmOrder.to_end_airport as pltmOrder_to_end_airport, pltmOrder.to_start_date as pltmOrder_to_start_date, pltmOrder.passenger_uptime as pltmOrder_passenger_uptime, pltmOrder.ticket_outtime as pltmOrder_ticket_outtime, pltmOrder.charges as pltmOrder_charges, pltmOrder.cancel_remarks as pltmOrder_cancel_remarks, pltmOrder.finance_status as pltmOrder_finance_status, pltmOrder.supplier as pltmOrder_supplier, pltmOrder.supplier_name as pltmOrder_supplier_name, pltmOrder.purchase as pltmOrder_purchase, pltmOrder.purchase_name as pltmOrder_purchase_name, pltmOrder.ticket_loss as pltmOrder_ticket_loss, pltmOrder.ticket_rate as pltmOrder_ticket_rate, pltmOrder.order_type AS pltmOrder_order_type, pltmOrder.contract_no as pltmOrder_contract_no
mapper.insert: insert into pltm_order (order_number, pss_order_number, purch_quantity, travel_days, unit_price, luggage_info, ticket_limit_time, pay_price, pay_name, pay_account, pay_user_id, pay_time, order_status, create_user, create_time, last_modify_time, last_modify_person, remark, to_start_airport, to_end_airport, to_start_date, pss_routing_fare_id,supplier,supplier_name,purchase,purchase_name, ticket_loss, ticket_rate,order_type,product_id,routing_type) values (#{orderNumber,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pssOrderNumber,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{purchQuantity,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{travelDays,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{unitPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{luggageInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ticketLimitTime,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{payPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{payName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifyPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toStartAirport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toEndAirport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pssRoutingFareId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supplier,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supplierName,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{purchase,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{purchaseName,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ticketLoss,jdbcType=REAL}, #{ticketRate,jdbcType=REAL}, #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{routingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into pltm_order (order_number, pss_order_number, purch_quantity, travel_days, unit_price, luggage_info, ticket_limit_time, pay_price, pay_name, pay_account, pay_user_id, pay_time, order_status, create_user, create_time, last_modify_time, last_modify_person, remark, to_start_airport, to_end_airport, to_start_date, pss_routing_fare_id,supplier,supplier_name,purchase,purchase_name, contract_no,ticket_loss,ticket_rate,order_type,product_id, old_purch_quantity,old_unit_price,old_ticket_loss,old_ticket_rate,routing_type ) values
(#{item.orderNumber,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.pssOrderNumber,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.purchQuantity,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{item.travelDays,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.unitPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.luggageInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ticketLimitTime,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.payPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.payName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.payAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.payUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.orderStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastModifyPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.toStartAirport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.toEndAirport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.toStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.pssRoutingFareId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.supplier,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.supplierName,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.purchase,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.purchaseName,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.contractNo},#{item.ticketLoss},#{item.ticketRate}, #{item.orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.oldPurchQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.oldUnitPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.oldTicketLoss,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.oldTicketRate,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.routingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update.foreach: update pltm_order set pss_order_number=#{ent} where order_number=#{key}

mapper.update:
update pltm_order
order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
finance_status = #{financeStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ticket_outtime = #{ticketTimeOut,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ticket_outtime=now(),
id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM pltm_order pltmOrder WHERE order_status in(2,3)
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(t.pay_price - t.pay_price * charges), 0) FROM pltm_order t WHERE t.supplier = #{supplier} AND t.order_status = 4;
